content: please let us build a habit tracker app with beautiful ui, create widget for homescreen, and live activity for a task. let us go

A habit tracking app called HabitFlow with:                                                                                                     - Daily habit checklist with streaks and progress rings                                                                                         - Live activity showing current habit streak on lock screen and dynamic island                                                                  - Home screen widget showing today's habits completion                                                                                          - Settings with dark/light/system appearance toggle and language picker (English, Arabic)                                                       - Haptic feedback on habit completion  - Local notifications for habit reminders
